description: This file defines a Flutter widget called ListScreen, which presents a list of sample items, allows adding new items via a dialog, viewing item details, and deleting items through swipe gestures. It interacts with a state controller and uses various Flutter UI components.

classes.name: ListScreen
classes.description: A StatelessWidget displaying a list of SampleItems with options to add, delete, and view details.

methods.name: _addItem
methods.description: Asynchronously prompts the user to enter a title for a new item via a dialog, then adds the item to the list using the list controller.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the ListScreen, displaying the list of items, refresh behavior, and action buttons.
